channel.title: Rscd
channel.description:
hey guys, hope your all good.
I need a little help understanding RSCD.. i've managed to host my own server locally.. but can someone give me some advice on RSCD and some useful tips ?
such as mod commands and so fourth..
Thanks.

item.title: Rscd
item.dc:creator: @Volencia Volencia
item.description:
@Volencia wrote:

[quote=“Suleman, post:1, topic:277440”]hey guys, hope your all good.

I need a little help understanding RSCD… i’ve managed to host my own server locally… but can someone give me some advice on RSCD and some useful tips ?

such as mod commands and so fourth…

Thanks.[/quote]::ban…::take(puts person in jail and also takes u to the jail) :: put(puts the person in jail) ::item (id) (amount) :: summon (username) (summons a person to u) ::goto (username) (teleports u to a person)basic commands for admin…

Read full topic
